name: Collins Maxwell
description: I am Collins,Old fashioned,Country boy,I think life is simple and beautiful,Everyone I see I …ume them as my family as long as they wish me well and they had good intention,Family is very important to me as well.I am a “moody” eater.I am very understanding.open,I can be shy at first but when someone makes me feel comfortable,I am as open as the bible.my perfect match evolves around kindness, tendering caring,honesty,considerate, compassion, being sensitive, affection and an open-mindedness.Someone with a few similar interests, great personality honest sweet loving,someone I can talk to about anything and everything.Someone that can make me laugh when I really just wanna cry,: someone that loves to snuggle, hold hands, is totally into romance, likes animals, and can accept my kids for who they are(Perfect match to me means two people who love and respect each other equally. If there’s inequality of love and respect on either side then it can’t be a healthy relationship I don’t think as one will always feel inadequate and the other wondering what if.
